summary: Comprehensive testing of Battwheels OS with LIGHT THEME. Fixed critical bug in Tickets page (tickets.slice error). All modules now working: Dashboard, Tickets, EFI, Settings, Inventory, Employees, Attendance, Leave Management. Navigation and logout working correctly.

bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.issue: TypeError: tickets.slice is not a function - API returns {tickets: [...]} but code expected array directly
bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.fix: Added handling for both array and {tickets: [...]} response formats in fetchTickets and fetchKPIs functions

login.notes: Login with admin@battwheels.in / admin123 works correctly

dashboard.notes: KPI cards and charts display correctly with light theme

tickets.notes: Fixed - now shows 63 tickets, KPI filters work, job card dialog opens

failure_intelligence.notes: 94 failure cards displayed, search and filters work

settings.notes: Profile, notifications, security sections all visible

new_ticket.notes: Form loads correctly with all fields

theme_verification.text_contrast: Good - dark text on light backgrounds

context_for_next_testing_agent: Light theme is now working across all modules. The Tickets page bug was fixed by handling the API response format correctly. All navigation links work. Backend APIs are stable and returning data correctly.
